title: Beyond A Viking Horizon
description: Balmung Nabbodderson is a man whose feet are as firmly planted in the year 908 as the roots of his thriving crops. Until, that is, he makes an unexpected discovery within the very soil he had vowed never to leave...  Iris Johnson, living in the time of the Great Depression. Suddenly widowed, she is left to raise four children against all odds.  With the security and well being for her children her utmost concern, will she be able to trust and open her heart to a man who claims to have come from a Time one thousand years past?.
author: Tami Dee
